meta.description: Brand concept for Willo Remedies, offering CBD products for mind, body and soul.

intro.description:
Willo Remedies is a company focussed on providing customers with natural CBD remedies for the body and soul.

Tasked with creating a brand from the ground up, this concept took a more natural, holistic angle with CBD serving as a secondary benefit.

A logo, colour palette and product packaging such as balms and tinctures were created alongside full brand guidelines, social media and website suggestions.

meta.description: Brand concept for Tinkr, an AI powered career app.

intro.description:
Tinkr is an up and coming app powered by artificial intelligence. Positioned as your own personal mentor in app form, it parses user's CVs and utilises data from other users to provide insight into your career.

As a start-up, Tinkr needed fresh branding which would help them stand out from their competitors. This included logo, visual system, messaging, app designs, brand guidelines and more.

This concept focussed on different aspects of the brand; firstly, the individuality of each user and their journey. Secondly, the personable aspect of the app and it's mentor-like status. These inspired the finger-print like patterns, always hinting at the unique nature of both the users and the app itself.

meta.description: Brand project for The Blend Academy, a gin mixing experience in the heart of Winchester.

image.alt: The Blend Academy personalised gin bottle design

intro.description:
The Winchester Distillery wanted to craft a new gin experience in the heart of Winchester with a bold new brand to boot.

After helping to choose a catchy name for the experience, I then had the pleasure of creating the logo, brand guidelines and illustrations for The Blend Academy, along with numerous pieces of printed collateral and interior design suggestions for the space.

This included print advertisements as well as window vinyls, bottle stickers, golden tickets, postcards and pull up banners to be used at events.

meta.description: Brand concept for Trade House Media, an online advertising agency.

intro.description:
THM are an online advertising agency who wanted a new look to help them stand out from the crowd.

I created a concept that looked at the digital aspect of their work but in an old-fashioned way, just like the traditional, people-first approach they take with their clients. This led me to an 8-bit style with a bold, modern colour palette to create cut-through against competitors.

Utilising people-focussed photography, the brand had a fun, human edge that connected with clients and helped THM show they have a more personal touch.
